attributes.action: see that Sir Victor Blank and Eric Daniels do not keep their positions as Chairman and Chief Executive respectively, of The Lloyds Banking Group.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the biggest shareholder the Gov't must realise the dissatifaction felt by the shareholders of Lloyds/TSB, that these two are still in their jobs and are being supported by the PM. Between them they have presided over the near destruction of a very good Bank.
